mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sd_voucher ( sd_voucher_id , vch_date , f_year , perd_number , vch_type_no , vch_type_name , vch_no , attach_ments , biller_name , biller_no , checker_name , checker_no , poster_name , fposter_no , vch_flag , cancel_flag , vch_source , c_total_amount , d_total_amount , vch_row_id , vch_info , acct_name , acct_id , cur_no , cur_name , rate_type_no , rate_type_name , rate , unit_id , price , d_amount_s , d_amount_n , c_amount_s , c_amount_n , d_qty , c_qty , ss_code , ss_name , bill_type , bill_no , bill_date , fzhs_info , cash_flow_info , is_relate_xjll , is_relate_fzhs , sd_elect_res_acc_id , create_date ) VALUES ( #{sdVoucherId} , #{vchDate} , #{fyear} , #{perdNumber} , #{vchTypeNo} , #{vchTypeName} , #{vchNo} , #{attachMents} , #{billerName} , #{billerNo} , #{checkerName} , #{checkerNo} , #{posterName} , #{fposterNo} , #{vchFlag} , #{cancelFlag} , #{vchSource} , #{ctotalAmount} , #{dtotalAmount} , #{vchRowId} , #{vchInfo} , #{acctName} , #{acctId} , #{curNo} , #{curName} , #{rateTypeNo} , #{rateTypeName} , #{rate} , #{unitId} , #{price} , #{damountS} , #{damountN} , #{camountS} , #{camountN} , #{dqty} , #{cqty} , #{ssCode} , #{ssName} , #{billType} , #{billNo} , #{billDate} , #{fzhsInfo} , #{cashFlowInfo} , #{isRelateXjll} , #{isRelateFzhs} , #{sdElectResAccId} , #{createDate} )

INSERT INTO sd_voucher ( vch_date , f_year , perd_number , vch_type_no , vch_type_name , vch_no , attach_ments , biller_name , biller_no , checker_name , checker_no , poster_name , fposter_no , vch_flag , cancel_flag , vch_source , c_total_amount , d_total_amount , vch_row_id , vch_info , acct_name , acct_id , cur_no , cur_name , rate_type_no , rate_type_name , rate , unit_id , price , d_amount_s , d_amount_n , c_amount_s , c_amount_n , d_qty , c_qty , ss_code , ss_name , bill_type , bill_no , bill_date , fzhs_info , cash_flow_info , is_relate_xjll , is_relate_fzhs , sd_elect_res_acc_id , create_date ) VALUES
( #{item.vchDateStr} , #{item.fyear} , #{item.perdNumber} , #{item.vchTypeNo} , #{item.vchTypeName} , #{item.vchNo} , #{item.attachMents} , #{item.billerName} , #{item.billerNo} , #{item.checkerName} , #{item.checkerNo} , #{item.posterName} , #{item.fposterNo} , #{item.vchFlag} , #{item.cancelFlag} , #{item.vchSource} , #{item.ctotalAmount} , #{item.dtotalAmount} , #{item.vchRowId} , #{item.vchInfo} , #{item.acctName} , #{item.acctId} , #{item.curNo} , #{item.curName} , #{item.rateTypeNo} , #{item.rateTypeName} , #{item.rate} , #{item.unitId} , #{item.price} , #{item.damountS} , #{item.damountN} , #{item.camountS} , #{item.camountN} , #{item.dqty} , #{item.cqty} , #{item.ssCode} , #{item.ssName} , #{item.billType} , #{item.billNo} , #{item.billDateStr} , #{item.fzhsInfo} , #{item.cashFlowInfo} , #{item.isRelateXjll} , #{item.isRelateFzhs} , #{item.sdElectResAccId} , now() )
mapper.update:
UPDATE sd_voucher
vch_date = #{vchDate},
f_year = #{fyear},
perd_number = #{perdNumber},
vch_type_no = #{vchTypeNo},
vch_type_name = #{vchTypeName},
vch_no = #{vchNo},
attach_ments = #{attachMents},
biller_name = #{billerName},
biller_no = #{billerNo},
checker_name = #{checkerName},
checker_no = #{checkerNo},
poster_name = #{posterName},
fposter_no = #{fposterNo},
vch_flag = #{vchFlag},
cancel_flag = #{cancelFlag},
vch_source = #{vchSource},
c_total_amount = #{ctotalAmount},
d_total_amount = #{dtotalAmount},
vch_row_id = #{vchRowId},
vch_info = #{vchInfo},
acct_name = #{acctName},
acct_id = #{acctId},
cur_no = #{curNo},
cur_name = #{curName},
rate_type_no = #{rateTypeNo},
rate_type_name = #{rateTypeName},
rate = #{rate},
unit_id = #{unitId},
price = #{price},
d_amount_s = #{damountS},
d_amount_n = #{damountN},
c_amount_s = #{camountS},
c_amount_n = #{camountN},
d_qty = #{dqty},
c_qty = #{cqty},
ss_code = #{ssCode},
ss_name = #{ssName},
bill_type = #{billType},
bill_no = #{billNo},
bill_date = #{billDate},
fzhs_info = #{fzhsInfo},
cash_flow_info = #{cashFlowInfo},
is_relate_xjll = #{isRelateXjll},
is_relate_fzhs = #{isRelateFzhs},
sd_elect_res_acc_id = #{sdElectResAccId},
create_date = #{createDate},
WHERE sd_voucher_id = #{sdVoucherId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE sd_voucher set state='X' WHERE sd_voucher_id = #{sdVoucherId}
